## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install data401_nlp in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure data401_nlp package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to data401_nlp
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/su-dataAI/data401-nlp):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/su-dataAI/data401-nlp.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/su-dataAI/data401-nlp)

``` sh
$ conda install -c su-dataAI data401_nlp
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/data401-nlp/)

``` sh
$ pip install data401_nlp
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/su-dataAI/data401-nlp)’s
[pages](https://su-dataAI.github.io/data401-nlp/). Additionally you can
find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/su-dataAI/data401-nlp) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/data401-nlp/) respectively.
